Entries.Introduction: Ah, Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}} told me you just arrived. I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}!#$e#I sell livestock and animal care products at my ranch. You should swing by some time.$h
Entries.Saloon_Fri: %{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}} doesn't seem to notice that you're there...
Entries.Saloon_Sat: I always see {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}} here but {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintGender}}}} won't talk to anyone. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintGender}}}} just glances over {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintGender}}}} shoulder now and then.$s
Entries.Fri4: #$1 marnieLike#I think someone in town has taken a liking to me. *teehee*$k$h#$e#I would be so lonely if {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneName}} ever moved out.
Entries.Fri6: I wonder if {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Mr:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisGender}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}} gets lonely in that big house of {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisGender}}}}... $s#$e#It seems so empty in there, doesn't it?
Entries.Tue: My {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Nephew:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneGender}}}} {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneName}} has been staying at my place the last few months.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneGender}}}} helps me out with the chickens, so I'm not complaining.

Entries.fall_18.000: Erm... Doctor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}}? This is completely confidential, right?
Entries.winter_18.002: Erm... Doctor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}}? When you give her the shots, can we have two lollipops?
